list.name: DORMANT-STAR
list.description: The next starfish will stay on the ground if an enemy is not hit, laying dormant until an enemy gets close.
list.descriptionHtml: The next starfish will stay on the ground if an enemy is not hit, laying dormant until an enemy gets close.

list.name: PHAT-SPLATTER
list.description: Otis's next attack shoots a giant ink ball that leaves a puddle, dealing x damage over time for x seconds.
list.descriptionHtml: Otis's next attack shoots a giant ink ball that leaves a puddle, dealing x damage over time for x seconds.
